definition: lit. directory of golden orchids/fig. genealogical record (esp. exchanged between sworn brothers)
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
to exchange cards containing personal details (when taking an oath of fraternity)
lit. directory of orchids/fig. genealogical record (esp. exchanged between sworn brothers)
to become sworn brothers or sisters/sworn (brothers)
epistolary formula used at the head of a letter
variant of 書簡|书简[shu1 jian3]
Oath of the Peach Garden, sworn by Liu Bei 劉備|刘备[Liu2 Bei4], Zhang Fei 張飛|张飞[Zhang1 Fei1] and Guan Yu 關羽|关羽[Guan1 Yu3] at the start of the Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4]
